meanings.sent1: My mutha always makes the best cookies.
meanings.sent2: I called my mutha to wish her a happy birthday.
meanings.sent3: When my mutha sings in the car, it's so funny!
meanings.sent4: Her love is like a warm hug from a mutha.
meanings.sent5: The smell of my mutha's cooking fills the house with joy.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier or expletive.
meanings.sent1: I am mutha tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: He ran mutha fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent3: She was mutha excited to see her favorite band in concert.
meanings.sent4: The storm came in mutha quickly, catching everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky mutha brightly on New Year's Eve.
